page.title: 09THE FLOWER SHOW- HURSTBOURNE
page.content: The Flower Vegetable and Produce Show will be held on September 7th 1985: 2pm-6pm in the Aisle Barn at Ibthorpe Manor Farm.{Entries}will be in the following Sections: A-{Gardens, B-{Vegetables,}C-{Fruits,}D-{Flowers,} E-{Floral Art,}F-{Produce,} { G-{Handicrafts,}H-{Children's classes. {Entry fees:}A- 30p, B-G- 10p each for 5 entries, 5p thereafter, H- 5p. {Prizes:}A- Â£2,Â£1,50p B,C,E,F,G- 50p 40p 30p H- 40p,30p,20p.Uncollected prize money being returned to funds. {Special Prizes:}(awarded at the Judges' discretion) Â£10, and vouchers from local garden centres and the Whist Club {Challenge Cups:}11, each held for 1 year include,The Sir Donald Wolfit Cup (section H), The Maltings Cup (G), The Presidents Cup (A), and The Marie Broke Cup (F).
